column1:
The  Appellant  preferred 
the  said  Appeal  against 
the  award  of  the  3rd
Respondent,  (Arbitrator)  who  inquired  into  a  dispute  between  the  Appellant  and

the  2nd  Respondent  (Teldeniya  Multipurpose  Cooperative  Society  Limited) 
to

recover a shortfall ofRs.  861,267.75/-
from  a fuel  station,  in which the Appellant
was  the  manager.  According  to  the  award  dated  29/0212012,  the  Appellant  was
served with a letter of demand to recover Rs.  621,162.00/-.
